ComicInfo.Summary: As if the power of THE DARKNESS were not terrifying enough -- look what happens when Capris and Jackie combine their powers to stop the Hostile Cherubs! And while Jackie finds himself inadvertantly fighting to prevent the world from falling to the Blood TIde...it means he's not able to testify as the key witness in the State's case against Frankie Franchetti! And what would the EXCITING CONCLUSION of the RIPCLAW five part story be...without a startling bang revelation by Jenny Romano?!
